audioText: Les archers tiraient leurs flèches avec une précision parfaite vers les cibles placées à cent mètres de distance.
question: How did the archers shoot their arrows toward targets placed one hundred meters away?
options: Using modern technology and advanced equipment
Following ancient traditional techniques and methods
After extensive training and professional coaching sessions
explanation: The text states 'Les archers tiraient leurs flèches avec une précision parfaite vers les cibles placées à cent mètres de distance' - The archers shot their arrows with perfect precision toward targets placed one hundred meters away. 'Tiraient' is the imperfect form of 'tirer' (to shoot/pull), 'précision' means precision, and 'parfaite' means perfect.
source: Strategic conjugate coverage development - archery competition
